mapper.select: select er.repair_id, er.repair_time, er.manager, er.status, er.type, rfm.equip_id, rfm.equip_name, rfm.has_renewal_part, rfm.is_working, rfm.model_id, rri.area_id, rri.route_record from public.equip_repair as er left join public.repair_facility_maintenance as rfm on rfm.repair_id = er.repair_id left join public.repair_routine_inspection as rri on rri.repair_id = er.repair_id
